headline: OpenAI, Oracle Deal Shows Need for Compute Power
summary: The US is self-sufficient in energy compared to the rest of the world, says Janet Mui, head of market analysis at RBC Brewin Dolphin. She joins Ed Ludlow on "Bloomberg Tech" to discuss the need for compute power as OpenAI and Oracle expand their on their Project Stargate deal.

headline: Oracle Has a ‘Blue Sky Scenario’ in OpenAI Deal. What It Means for the Stock.
summary: Shares popped on Wednesday after Bloomberg reported that the company was expanding its Stargate data-center project with OpenAI.  The ChatGPT maker will rent roughly 4.5 gigawatts of new U.S. data center capacity, the outlet said, citing people familiar with the matter.  After closing up 5% on Wednesday,  Oracle  stock continued to gain, climbing 3.2% to $237.35 on Thursday.

After closing up 5% on Wednesday,  Oracle  stock continued to gain, climbing 3.2% to $237.35 on Thursday.

headline: Meta, FedEx, Oracle: Trending Tickers
summary: Meta (META) was upgraded to Hold from Underperform by Needham analyst Laura Martin, citing higher employee productivity than Apple (AAPL) and Amazon (AMZN). FedEx (FDX) was upgraded to Outperform from Underperform by BNP Paribas after the company outperformed rival UPS (UPS) in volume and yield growth. Oracle (ORCL) is expanding its cloud deal with OpenAI (OPAI.PVT) by reportedly renting out 4.5 gigawatts of data-center power to the company, according to Bloomberg. To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out more Market Catalysts here.
